createAll() - Method in interface fr.projet.jee.utils.interfaces.IPopulate
Creates the maximum number of groups (see IPopulate.createGroups()) and the maximum number of persons (see IPopulate.createPersons(int)) and sorts them through all the groups

createPersons(int) - Method in interface fr.projet.jee.utils.interfaces.IPopulate
Creates as much persons as possible without creating 2 with the same name (according to the number of surnames and last names avaiable in the property file) and sorts them among a given number of groups
createPersons(int, int) - Method in interface fr.projet.jee.utils.interfaces.IPopulate
Creates a a given number of persons, which must be less or equal to the maximum authorized (see IPopulate.createPersons(int)) and sorts them through groups
